privacyPolicyConfirmation.title: Privacy Policy confirmation
privacyPolicyConfirmation.desc: By checking these boxes, you confirm that you have read and understood the Terms of Service and the LTG Privacy Policy in their entirety

cookies.message: We use cookies on this site to enhance your user experience. For a complete overview of all cookies used, please see your personal settings.

auth.title: Authorization
auth.desc: Authorization with Xsolla Wallet is a simple and secure way to access the LTG Multiverse. Your personal data is in good hands!
auth.tip: For more info on Xsolla Wallet, see the {guide}

loading.title: Unpacking your gift
loading.desc: Please wait until your gift link is applied

autoDownloadLauncher.title: All set
autoDownloadLauncher.desc:
Please open the file that was downloaded and enjoy your game!
If your download didn't start, please try again

about.title: A Home for Legendary Games
about.desc: Where new games are brought to life, classic games are reimagined, and players can find their next adventure

bestGames.title: Modern takes on classic titles
bestGames.desc: Rediscover former favorites that we've updated with innovative ideas to ensure they continue to keep their original charm.

bestExperience.title: A platform for rising stars
bestExperience.desc: Dive into new game releases we've brought to life that captivate your attention and inspire you to replay them time and time again.

bestFriends.title: Commitment to community
bestFriends.desc: Join a community dedicated to shaping the future of gaming. We're not just here to listen, your thoughts and experiences are the catalysts for crafting unforgettable games.

promocodes.title: Enter promocode
promocodes.desc: Here you can activate a new promocode or view the history of previously activated promocodes on your account

messages.invalid: Invalid promocode. Please, try again later or contact support
messages.limited: You have already used this promocode
messages.alreadyUsed: This promocode has already been used
messages.internalError: Something went wrong while applying this promocode. Please, try again later or contact support
messages.alreadyHaveTrial: You can only activate the trial period once
